title.en: Jimiko na Watashi wa Iroke wo Dashitai

altTitles.ja: 地味子な私は色気を出したい

altTitles.ja-ro: Jimiko na Watashi wa Iroke wo Dashitai

altTitles.en: I’m a Plain Girl and I Want to Show Off My Sex Appeal

description.en:
Koto Furukawa is a plain girl who is always staying in a corner of the classroom silently and without trying to stand out. A girl like her quietly held feelings for a boy named Yuuta Kishi, a game otaku. She would always get saved by the dependable Kishi-kun whenever it seemed like the boys from class would make a pass at her.

In order to keep a boy like him around, she ends up trying a "sexy approach" as a result of consulting her older sister, a gal. Kishi-kun isn't such a pervert — this is what she believed while she tries to get his gaze fixed on her thighs after unexpectedly shortening her skirt!?

(Source: AlphaPolis)

---

Note: This is the 2023 short-term serialization published by AlphaPolis.
description.ja: いつもクラスの隅っこで目立たず大人しくしている地味子の古川琴。そんな彼女は密やかにゲーオタの「岸悠太」に想いを寄せていた。琴がクラスの男子にちょっかいを出されそうになるといつも助けてくれる頼りがいがある岸君。そんな彼を落とすべく、ギャルの姉に相談した結果、「エッチなアプローチ」を試してみることに!? 岸君はそんな変態じゃない――そう信じるも意外と短くしたスカートの太ももに目線はくぎ付けで!?アルファポリス投稿漫画ランキング1位！ニコニコ漫画青年マンガランキング10位の人気作が満を持して短期集中連載化！
